entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a character in the story who is excited to share news with Harry Potter. He says 'And then, Harry Potter, Dobby goes to visit Winky, and finds out Winky has been freed too, sir!' (emphasis added).

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a character in the story who is crying and upset. She flung herself forward off her stool and lay face-down on the flagged stone floor, beating her tiny fists upon it and positively screaming with misery.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a character in the story who is being addressed by Dobby. Dobby says 'And then, Harry Potter, Dobby goes to visit Winky, and finds out Winky has been freed too, sir!'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character in the story who tries to comfort Winky. She hastily dropped down to her knees beside her and tried to comfort her.

relationships.description: Dobby visits Winky, as mentioned in the story 'And then, Harry Potter, Dobby goes to visit Winky, and finds out Winky has been freed too, sir!'
Dobby addresses Harry Potter in the story 'And then, Harry Potter, Dobby goes to visit Winky, and finds out Winky has been freed too, sir!'
Hermione tries to comfort Winky in the story 'She hastily dropped down to her knees beside her and tried to comfort her'.
